attributes.action: Hold pharmaceutical companies liable for health-related issues with vaccinations
attributes.additional_details: The main issue of concern is the new methodology used in the vaccine by Pfizer in order to fight the coronavirus. The vaccine relies on ‘messenger RNA technology which has never been used before in an approved medicine. It has been stated that ‘There are unique and unknown risks to messenger RNA vaccines, including the possibility that they generate strong type I interferon responses that could lead to inflammation and autoimmune conditions’.
attributes.background: I would like for the Government to hold Pharmaceutical companies liable for health-related issues with the newly developed Coronavirus vaccine by Pfizer.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562412
